name: recouple
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to join or connect things that have become separated: The driver was seriously injured while attempting to recouple the train carriages. A rise in interest rates may be the only way to recouple the housing market with reality.
More examplesFewer examplesOne needs to recouple the notion of sustainable development with technological development.I think recoupling crop production to livestock and having people purchase the meat raised closer to home will definitely help the environment.They attempted to recouple the car and trailer.
